footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, effects, and sacred nature of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you on your journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key. Follow our guide to get ready.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay connected, receive updates on upcoming events, and be part of our growing healing community. Your journey of transformation begins here.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You are now signed in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community and start your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Please check your email for a verification link.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, composed of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis). Together, they create a powerful brew that opens the doors to deep spiritual and emotional exploration, used for centuries in healing and self-discovery rituals.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The combination of these plants activates DMT in the brain, a molecule that our body naturally produces. This activation induces visionary states that allow for introspection, emotional release, and a profound connection with the subconscious. The process is guided to ensure a safe and contained environment for this inner journey.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Plant as a Spiritual Master
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, purifies, and heals. Each experience is unique and deeply personal, offering clarity on life patterns, unresolved emotional wounds, and one's purpose. It is a tool for transformation that requires respect, intention, and a willingness to surrender to the process.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to deep-seated questions and gain a clearer sense of their life's purpose and direction.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: The medicine allows access to repressed memories and emotions, facilitating the healing of traumas and emotional blockades in a compassionate way.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a profound sense of connection with yourself, others, and the universe, expanding your consciousness and perception of reality.
groupCeremonyDescription: Participate in a shared space where the collective energy enhances the individual experience. It's an opportunity to heal in community, supported by the group's strength and the guides' experience.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized process, we offer private ceremonies. This format allows for a deeper focus on your specific intentions, with the exclusive dedication of our guides.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Find the perfect space to begin or continue your healing journey. Each ceremony is a unique opportunity for transformation.
authRequiredDescription: Please sign in to your account to reserve a spot for this ceremony.
guidesPageSubtitle: We are honored to introduce the experienced and dedicated guides who will accompany you on your healing journey. Each one brings a unique blend of wisdom, compassion, and experience to ensure a safe and transformative space.

mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide an image URL or upload a file.

addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
formRegisterRequired: Require user to be registered to reserve

deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony from the database.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. You can still edit it later.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the 'Previous Events' section.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from non-admin users. You can reactivate it later.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counts for this ceremony to zero.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage user roles and data.
allUsersDescription: List of all registered users in the system.

newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: [LINK]
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: [LINK]
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
analyticsDescription: See which sections of your site are getting the most interaction.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click tracking data. This action cannot be undone.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: A verification link has been sent to your new email address.
passwordRequired: Password is required for this action.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user will be assigned to.
noCeremoniesFound: No ceremonies have been created yet.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here are the ceremonies you are registered for. Get ready for your journey.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You are not currently assigned to any ceremonies. Explore our upcoming events to find your next journey.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire answers have been submitted by this user yet.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart, respiratory, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants or supplements)?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder)?
questionnaireExperience: Do you have previous experience with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'Yes'.
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve...
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the steps. You are ready for the next phase of your journey. We will contact you soon with more details.
preparationProcessDescription: Our process is divided into four key stages to ensure a deep and lasting experience.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The central experience where you connect with the medicine in a safe and sacred environment.
experienceProcessDescription: The inner journey of visions, emotions, and self-discovery guided by the plant.
integrationProcessDescription: The crucial process of applying the lessons learned into your daily life for lasting change.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before the ceremony, we recommend a clean diet to prepare your body.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables, whole grains (rice, quinoa), legumes, lean meats (chicken, fish), and plenty of water.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat, pork, fermented foods, spicy or very salty foods, dairy, sugar, and caffeine. Avoid alcohol and recreational drugs.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Cultivate a state of calm and openness to receive the medicine's teachings.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal or understand. Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Write about your fears, hopes, and expectations before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. The key is to not resist them. Allow yourself to feel, cry, laugh, and release whatever comes up. Our guides will be there to support you. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine to show you what you need to heal.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: To ensure your comfort and a good experience, we recommend bringing the following:
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, loose-fitting clothing (preferably light colors), a warm blanket or sleeping bag, a pillow or cushion, and a water bottle.
essentialsList: A notebook and pen for journaling, a flashlight (with red light if possible), personal hygiene items, and an open heart.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Sign in or create an account to begin your preparation and access exclusive content.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: Sign in or create an account to view and reserve our sacred ceremonies.
authRequiredCoursesDescription: Sign in or create an account to access our library of preparatory and integration courses.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: This is a copy of the answers you submitted for your preparation.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Your journey of transformation requires conscious preparation of body, mind, and spirit. This guide will accompany you every step of the way.
backupSubtitle: Manage your application's data by exporting or importing it.
exportDataDescription: Download a JSON file containing all your site's data (ceremonies, guides, content, etc.).
importDataDescription: Import data from a previously exported JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been imported and applied.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite all current data in the application with the data from the selected file. This cannot be undone.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can restore it if the import caused issues.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the state before the last import.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to restore the data from before the last import? All changes made since then will be lost.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations between users and the AI Spiritual Guide.
allConversationsDescription: Browse through the complete history of user chats.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, I am the Spiritual Guide of 'The Art of Healing'. How can I assist you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
errorLogsSubtitle: Monitor and manage system errors reported by the application.
systemLogsDescription: A list of all captured errors. Review them to identify and fix issues.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this error log?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
